docs.text: Person schema A small excerpt from the schema.org model Classes Thing - The most generic type of item. Person - A person (alive, dead, undead, or fictional). Mixins Slots additionalName - An additional name for a person, can be used as a middle name. gender - Person gender givenName - Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person. identifier - The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, name - The name of the item. url - URL of the item Types Built in URIorCURIE str Defined Text ( str ) - A character string URL ( URIorCURIE ) - a URI or a CURIE

docs.text: Class: Person A person (alive, dead, undead, or fictional). URI: sdo:Person Parents is_a: Thing - The most generic type of item. Attributes Own additionalName 0..* Description: An additional name for a person, can be used as a middle name. range: Text gender OPT Description: Person gender range: givenName 0..* Description: Given name. In the U.S., the first name of a Person. range: Text Inherited from Thing: identifier 0..* Description: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details. range: Text name REQ Description: The name of the item. range: Text url REQ Description: URL of the item range: URL
